meanings.definition: The number one followed by twenty-seven zeros.
meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned that an octillion is a one followed by twenty-seven zeros.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated that there are an octillion stars in the universe.
meanings.sent3: I have an octillion chores to do before the party tonight!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an octillion stars shining brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The octillion grains of sand on the beach seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.sent1: The company made an octillion dollars in profit last year.
meanings.sent2: There are an octillion possibilities for our future.
meanings.sent3: I have an octillion reasons why chocolate is the best flavor.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered with an octillion voices, filling the stadium with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The task ahead seemed as daunting as an octillion mountains to climb.
